title: San Antonio Missions National Historical Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Nearby Attractions       San Antonio, Texas, and the surrounding region is rich in history and teeming with notable attractions. We have provided the following links as a service to people planning to visit San Antonio. This is not a comprehensive list of area attractions, as we try to link to sites comparable to the mission of the National Park Service. We try to be as accurate as possible. Click here for links to areas within a day's journey from San Antonio.      San Antonio Convention and Visitors Bureau       The Alamo (Mission San Antonio de Valero) Casa Navarro State Historic Site      Spanish Governor's Palace San Fernando Cathedral      La Villita Historic Arts Village El Mercado (Market Square)      Institute of Texan Cultures Witte Museum Southwest School of Art & Craft      The Marion Koogler McNay Art Museum San Antonio Museum of Art
